# wy-image-grid

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Type         | Default |
|----------|-----------|--------------|---------|
| `images` |           | `FileType[]` | []      |
| `limit`  | `limit`   | `number`     | 3       |

## Methods

| Method             | Type                               |
|--------------------|------------------------------------|
| `createRenderRoot` | `(): this`                         |
| `dispatchFileOpen` | `(e: Event, file: FileType): void` |

## Events

| Event       | Type                               |
|-------------|------------------------------------|
| `file-open` | `CustomEvent<{ file: FileType; }>` |
